title: BBC.Horizon.2014.Ebola.The.Search.for.a.Cure.PDTV.x264.AAC..mp4
description:
Ebola: The Search for a Cure

Health-Medical Documentary hosted by Caroline Catz, published by BBC broadcasted as part of BBC Horizon series in 2014 - English narration



Information
------------------------------

The Ebola virus is one of the most virulent infections known to science. This special episode of Horizon meets the scientists and doctors from all around the world looking for the cure and hears first-hand accounts of what it is actually like to catch and survive the disease.
